name: Bachelor of Science in Child Learning and Development

requirements.name: I. Core Curriculum Requirements: 42 semester credit hours2

options.description: Or select any 6 semester credit hours from Communication Core courses (see advisor)

options.name: Choose one course from the following:

options.description: Or select any 3 semester credit hours from Mathematics Core courses (see advisor)
Select 6 semester credit hours from Life and Physical Sciences Core courses
Select 3 semester credit hours from Language, Philosophy and Culture Core courses
Select 3 semester credit hours from Creative Arts Core courses
Select 6 semester credit hours from American History Core courses
Select 6 semester credit hours from Government/Political Science Core courses
Or select any 3 semester credit hours from Social and Behavioral Sciences Core courses (see advisor)
Or select any 6 semester credit hours from Component Area Option Core courses (see advisor)

requirements.name: II. Major Requirements: 36 semester credit hours

options.name: Guided Electives: 3 semester credit hours of one of the following:

options.description: Plus 12 semester credit hours of courses with CLDP prefix or any of the following courses: CGS 3342, CGS 4314, CGS 4315, CGS 4352, CGS 4353, ED 4352, ED 4363, ED 4357, NSC 4352, NSC 4353, NSC 4354, NSC 4367, PSY 3331, PSY 3333, PSY 3361, PSY 4331, PSY 4343, PSY 4359, PSY 4362, PSY 4364, PSY 4373, SPAU 3301, SPAU 3304, SPAU 3340, SPAU 3343, SPAU 3344, SPAU 3345 or SPAU 4308.

requirements.name: III. Elective Requirements: 42 semester credit hours

options.description: Students are encouraged to explore areas of concentration in Child Learning and Development as well as explore interests outside the field. Be aware that at least 51 semester credit hours of upper-division courses are required for graduation.
